item.title: NOK
item.description: score:344 Chances: Nokia’s disinvestment deal to offload its Device Management and Software Management business reflects the company’s strategic focus on key growth areas such as SaaS, 5G core, and Network as a Code. The acquisition of Device Management and Service Management Platform businesses by Lumine Group enhances Nokia’s software portfolio and allows Nokia to focus on investing in other strategic areas.
